comment._content:
LOC -- check your title. There is no "e" at the end of Green's name -- and no hyphen between Perry and Joseph.

Green appears to have been a traveling evangelist for an offbeat metaphysical philosophy called New Thought, which was allied with the Unity movement, and embraced aspects of Christianity, spiritual healing and Hinduism. This photo probably was connected with his preaching in New York, but Google also reports him in Pennsylvania and in Portland, Oregon, where he settled for a time and lectured at a Truth Temple, before leaving to go on the road again.
